Description: Witness the awe-inspiring spectacle of the Great Migration, where millions of wildebeest embark on their annual journey across the Serengeti plains.
Explore the Ngorongoro Crater, a UNESCO World Heritage Site and home to a diverse range of wildlife.
Relax and unwind on the beautiful beaches of Zanzibar, known for its turquoise waters and stunning coral reefs.
Go on a safari adventure in Lake Manyara National Park, known for its tree-climbing lions and diverse birdlife.
Immerse yourself in the culture of the Maasai people by visiting a traditional village and learning about their way of life.
Learn about Tanzania's coffee production process by taking a tour of a local coffee plantation.

EventName: Wildlife Viewing in Tarangire National Park
Description: See a variety of animals, including elephants, lions, and zebras, on a safari in Tarangire National Park.
